price: Isaan sun waan hojjachaa turaniif jecha teessoon isaanii ibidda.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: ulāika mawāhumu al-nāru bimā kānū yaksibūna
